dashboard.label: SPLing Bee Directions
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_QDqzexub":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Welcome to the SPLing Bee App!","textColor":"#f8be34","fontSize":43}},"viz_y4G5Dhsw":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Test your spl-fu!","fontSize":20}},"viz_gti5G3Dr":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Moderator Setup:","fontWeight":"bold","textColor":"#f8be34"}},"viz_ec2A2q1K":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"1. Install SPLBee App on an instance that is accessible over internet or local network used by contestants 
 - This app contains:
 index=spl_bee - used for scoring
 TCP input listening on port 8999 for submissions
2. Install Lookup Editor in order to edit questions/answers","fontSize":22}},"viz_LUKLXmXM":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Moderator Tips:","fontWeight":"bold","textColor":"#f8be34"}},"viz_FyYr6t65":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"1. Open each dashboard on a new tab to easily flip between them
 - SPLing Bee: Deliver questions to contestants
 - Edit Results: Append the results table from SPLing Bee dashboard after each round
 - Scoreboard: Displays the overall score
 - Edit Questions: Update or create new questions and answers
2. Have fun!","fontSize":22}},"viz_T6eHykA8":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Contestant Setup:","fontWeight":"bold","textColor":"#f8be34"}},"viz_o5Gsqoiq":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"1. Install Splunk (Local to your computer or try a SplunkCloud trial https://www.splunk.com/page/sign_up/cloudtrial.)
2. Install the Add-on for SPLing Bee from Splunkbase, if not using the same environment as the Moderator
3. Follow directions in the Add-on
4. Have a SPLendid time!","fontSize":22}}},"dataSources":{},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","width":1300},"structure":[{"item":"viz_QDqzexub","type":"block","position":{"x":240,"y":0,"w":640,"h":60}},{"item":"viz_y4G5Dhsw","type":"block","position":{"x":470,"y":50,"w":160,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_gti5G3Dr","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":100,"w":300,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_ec2A2q1K","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":140,"w":1260,"h":160}},{"item":"viz_LUKLXmXM","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":290,"w":300,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_FyYr6t65","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":330,"w":1270,"h":180}},{"item":"viz_T6eHykA8","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":500,"w":300,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_o5Gsqoiq","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":540,"w":1250,"h":140}}],"globalInputs":[]},"description":"","title":"SPLing Bee Directions"}
